main event: Multiple UFO sightings reported over Dayton, Ohio between December 4 and December 22, 1957.
interesting points: One sighting involved a high, bright silver object moving from North to SSW,Operations confirmed two aircraft in the vicinity during one sighting, A citizen reported seeing an unusual flashing star, which was identified as Venus, A witness described a bright light that appeared to split into smaller objects, Witnesses reported that a very bright object looked like an explosion and seemed to be falling, Several sightings noted an erratic, zigzagging motion of the objects.
witness description: Various civilian witnesses, including a man and his wife looking out their window and others reporting from different locations.
